title: Be the Partner to Unveil New Patient Relationship Management Platform at DPharm
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: Be the Partner 
CAMBRIDGE, Mass. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Be the Partner , a Cambridge-based startup and subsidiary of Berlin-based Cytolon Digital Health AG announced today that Ryan Norris, Senior Vice of Product Innovation will present their new Patient Relationship Management Platform at the Dpharm: Disruptive Innovations to Advance Clinical Trials conference being held in Boston, MA, on September 10-11, 2015. 
Norris will present alongside several other change agents in industry in a discussion facilitated by Andreas Koster of Janssen Pharmaceuticals and Komathi Stem of Genentech at 1:40PM on September 10. Norris will speak specifically about “A New Model for Patient Engagement”, discussing how transparency and connectivity can create new opportunities to foster a long-term relationship between sponsors and patients. 
Dpharm is in its 5th year inviting thought leaders from across the pharmaceutical industry to discuss how drug development can be improved through innovation of all kinds. 
Dpharm attendees will be able to visit Be the Partner at Booth #6 to see an early preview of their software platform and talk to their team about the opportunity to employ technology to better connect patients to sponsors and make clinical research have a lasting and meaningful impact beyond the trial. 
To arrange a meeting or discussion with Be the Partner at Dpharm: Disruptive Innovations to Advance Clinical Trials and learn more about their patient relationship management platform, please contact info@bethepartner.com . 
About Be the Partner 
Be the Partner provides technology that makes clinical trials a better experience and gains patient insights beyond the trial. Our platform enables data sharing and communication between de-identified study participants and pharmaceutical companies. We partner with industry and work closely with patients and clinical research sites to better understand the challenges of creating connectivity with patients before, during, and after the trial and design, build, and operate a platform that solves for those challenges. 
Our team comes from health, life sciences, technology, and business backgrounds and has a passion for building solutions to problems that are clear and present. We draw on not only our years of experience, but a desire to deeply understand the challenges people have in collaborating in research that can change lives. Our solution is immensely extensible and scalable, allowing us to collaborate with our customers to fit it to their precise needs and provide valuable insights into their patient populations. It is a software-as-a-service offering in the cloud, allowing subscribers the ability to gain all of the benefits of Be the Partner’s technology while avoiding the cost and overhead of operating a patient engagement platform.
